name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas countdown”
”Alexa, start christmas countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming events. In our case, Christmas day. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
